INSERT INTO `g_column` ( column_name, column_type, attr_name, attr_type, column_comment, column_key, extra, number, table_id ) VALUES
( #{item.columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.columnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.attrType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.columnComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.columnKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extra,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tableId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
mapper.update:
update `g_column` set
column_name =#{columnName},
column_type =#{columnType},
attr_name =#{attrName},
attr_type =#{attrType},
column_comment =#{columnComment},
column_key =#{columnKey},
extra =#{extra},
table_id =#{tableId}, ,
number =#{number},
id =#{id} where id =#{id}

CREATE TABLE ${tableName} ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `lamp_device_code` varchar(30) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '单灯控制器SN', `lamp_status` varchar(10) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '设备开关状态 (0为关灯，1为亮灯)', `voltage` int(6) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '当前电压(V)', `currency` int(6) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '当前电流（A）', `power` int(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '当前功率（w）', `power_factor` int(3) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '功率因数', `signal_number` int(3) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '信号', `created_at` timestamp(0) NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), `updated_at` timestamp(0) NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0) ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(0), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 5860 CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci COMMENT = '单灯设备原始数据表' ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic; INSERT INTO ${tableName} select * from lamp_inverter_data; TRUNCATE TABLE lamp_inverter_data
